TopicTitle: Need to be unreasonably close to Bop to enter low orbit science threshold.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti | RAM: 16 GB

 

The low orbit threshold for science on Bop is 25km above sea level which is so low that you only get access to 4x time warp and might even be low enough to collide with some of the mountains. Can't even switch to another vessel to try to get higher time warp speeds because if I do it will destroy the vessel.

Similar for Dress, also at 25km. Maybe not a bug, but it feels too low.
